original_text: Together they will fight a war against the Lamb. But the Lamb will win against them. He is the Lord above all lords. He is the King who rules over all kings. And God's people will be with him. They are the people that the Lamb has chosen to belong to him. They are the people who have continued to trust him.’
korean_text: 그들이 어린 양과 더불어 싸우려니와 어린 양은 만주의 주시요 만왕의 왕이시므로 그들을 이기실 터이요 또 그와 함께 있는 자들 곧 부르심을 받고 택하심을 받은 진실한 자들도 이기리로다

sentences.original_text: Together they will fight a war against the Lamb.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 함께 어린 양을 치르고 전쟁을 치를 것이다.

sentences.original_text: But the Lamb will win against them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어린 양은 그들을 이길 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He is the Lord above all lords.
He is the King who rules over all kings.
And God's people will be with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님의 백성은 그와 함께 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They are the people that the Lamb has chosen
They are the people who have continued to trust him.
